arrived-date.required: Please provide a valid date of when you arrived or entered the UK
arrived-date.before: Please enter a date prior to 20 July 2023

arrival-details.required: You must provide details about when you arrived
arrival-details.maxlength: Arrival details must be 15,000 characters or less
arrival-details.regex: Arrival details must not include the following special characters [ ] < > / |
arrival-details.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/url into your answers
